relation: the campus at night and at day have police officers looking after the campus. also if you ever need an emergency or anyone to walk you to your car there is a specific number to call and an officer will be sent to look after you and walk you to the car.
there is a variety of booth stands to choose from to get into a sorority of fraternity. they work with you and your schedule. they have plenty of events and fun activities.
there are a variety of clubs but if for some reason there is not a club you want, you can start the club youself.

there are sororities in campus in case if one does not have anything to do. there is also free access to the school gym it is one of the best gyms from the cal states. also there are plenty of groups to get involved with. there are also events and sports to join on ones spare time.
the food and dinning at the commons is great because they cook a variety of meals. if there is a meal one does not like there are dinning dollars to be able o go buy at other food place in campus.
the residential area has been great we all get to meet new people and see different faces all the time. its an unforgettable experience not only to one but to everyone in the dorms.
in every educational department the teachers and staff will do their best to work with you and will even extend their office hours.
tips i would recommend to other students will be to apply to as many scholarships as they can because tuition has increased.

a ten out of ten rate is what cal state bakersfield deserves to receive due to the fact that it has taught me how to value our environment. also because it has had plenty of educational opportunities not only for my intended major but also for my personality. i have had a great residential and educational experience that i would recommend for other students to apply to this school.

textAfterTable: Tips for prospective students Because college teachers do not collect homework each student needs to find there own motivation for getting their homework done on time. Bang for the buck 1513 is the average tuition cost for each quarter Am enjoying being here The school has everything a student might be looking for. The school has a recreation center, a health center, a counselling center, a library, and a career development center. What more could you ask for? Am learning a lot The teachers at CSU Bakersfield strive to provide an atmosphere that both teaches as well as entertains, for that reason I feel like I am constantly learning.
